com.example.hotpot0.models

Class ProfileDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.example.hotpot0.models.ProfileDB

  • public class ProfileDB
extends java.lang.Object
    ProfileDB handles all Firestore operations for UserProfile and AdminProfile. It can add, delete, update, and fetch profiles. It also manages the ID assignment using the Counters collection.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  ProfileDB.ActionCallback
      Generic callback interface for async Firestore operations that don't return a result.
      static interface  ProfileDB.GetCallback<T>
      Generic callback interface for async Firestore operations that return a result.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ProfileDB()
      Initializes a ProfileDB instance and connects to Firestore.

      Adds a linkID to the user's linkIDs array, avoiding duplicates.

      Deletes an AdminProfile by adminID.

      Deletes a UserProfile by userID.

      Generates the next smallest available ID for a given type ("users" or "admins").

        public ProfileDB()

    • Method Detail

      • generateNewID

        public void generateNewID(java.lang.String type,
                          ProfileDB.GetCallback<java.lang.Integer> callback)
        Generates the next smallest available ID for a given type ("users" or "admins").
        Parameters:
        type - Either "users" or "admins"
        callback - Callback to return the generated ID asynchronously

      • authenticateAdmin

        public void authenticateAdmin(java.lang.String username,
                              java.lang.String password,
                              ProfileDB.GetCallback<AdminProfile> callback)
        Authenticates an admin with the given username and password.
        Parameters:
        username - The admin's username
        password - The admin's password
        callback - Callback to return the AdminProfile on success or error on failure

      • deleteAdmin

        public void deleteAdmin(int adminID,
                        ProfileDB.ActionCallback callback)
        Deletes an AdminProfile by adminID.
        Parameters:
        adminID - The ID of the admin to delete
        callback - Callback to notify success or failure

      • addUserProfile

        public void addUserProfile(UserProfile user,
                           ProfileDB.GetCallback<UserProfile> callback)
        Adds a new UserProfile and returns the created profile on success. This method is used by UserSignupVerifier to create and retrieve the new user in one step.
        Parameters:
        user - The UserProfile object (without userID)
        callback - Callback that returns the created UserProfile

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(UserProfile user,
                       ProfileDB.ActionCallback callback,
                       java.lang.Double longitude,
                       java.lang.Double latitude,
                       java.lang.Boolean notificationsEnabled)
        Updates an existing UserProfile in Firestore. Only updates name, emailID, and phoneNumber.
        Parameters:
        user - The UserProfile object with updated values (must have userID)
        callback - Callback to notify success or failure

      • deleteUser

        public void deleteUser(int userID,
                       ProfileDB.ActionCallback callback)
        Deletes a UserProfile by userID.
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the user to delete
        callback - Callback to notify success or failure

      • getUserByID

        public void getUserByID(int userID,
                        ProfileDB.GetCallback<UserProfile> callback)
        Fetches a UserProfile by userID.
        Parameters:
        userID - The ID of the user to fetch
        callback - Callback to return the UserProfile or an error

      • getUserByDeviceID

        public void getUserByDeviceID(java.lang.String deviceID,
                              ProfileDB.GetCallback<UserProfile> callback)
        To check if User already exists - and skip StartupActivity.java
        Parameters:
        deviceID - device identifier associated with the user
        callback - callback returning the UserProfile or an error

      • addLinkIDToUser

        public void addLinkIDToUser(UserProfile user,
                            java.lang.String linkID,
                            ProfileDB.GetCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Adds a linkID to the user's linkIDs array, avoiding duplicates.
        Parameters:
        user - the user profile to update
        linkID - the link ID to add
        callback - callback to notify success or failure

      • removeLinkIDFromUser

        public void removeLinkIDFromUser(UserProfile user,
                                 java.lang.String linkID,
                                 ProfileDB.GetCallback<java.lang.Void> callback)
        Removes a linkID from the user's linkIDs array.
        Parameters:
        user - the user profile to update
        linkID - the link ID to remove
        callback - callback to notify success or failure
